roleset.name: without having to pay or be penalized
roleset.note: SCOTFREE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Modeled after free-j.01 because BOLT usage was more similar to this than what I would think of as normative usages of "scot free". (from scotfree.01-j)

example.name: Args 1 & 3
example.text: Israel has illegally obtained and continues to have a nuclear arsenal , not to mention the innumerable UN violations against it's neighbours , yet it is metaphorically Scot free to do as it pleases .

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: Luckily for him, the other guy had no insurance so he was scot-free from any hassle.
